Topic.Title: I will be long IBM at $165-172 range..sure, they have to stop Body Shipping too

Message.Title: To do charity before or after earnings?
Message.Msg: This is from a friend of mine, passing it along for some friendly advice, if its not too much of a bother to some long-term IBM watchers here: He has decided to help a poor patient with some fin. assistance for her surgery ... need is worth about 5K, and his present situation allows him to do 2K. That means the surgery could be delayed until the gap is filled somehow. So he was thinking: what about if he buys Feb 195 IBM calls now, and sell it off after earnings.. and possibly, he can provide the entire amount then by himself. Question -- do you think it will work? Is IBM that oversold presently? Or any other pick?
